mapper.select: SELECT a.id as ID, a.name as NAME, a.fname as FNAME, a.sex as SEX, b.func_name as FUNCROLENAME FROM user a, function_power b WHERE a.departNo = #{departNo} AND a.func_role = b.func_role ORDER BY a.id;

SELECT a.id as ID, a.name as NAME, a.fname as FNAME, a.sex as SEX, b.func_name as FUNCROLENAME FROM user a, function_power b WHERE a.departNo = #{departNo} AND a.func_role = #{funcrole} AND a.func_role = b.func_role ORDER BY a.id;
mapper.delete: DELETE a,u FROM user a LEFT JOIN user_authority u ON a.ID=u.userId WHERE a.ID=#{userid}
